content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Lab
Consists of lab (position not specified) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a full chest
-  Make sure to empty the chest before extracting items from it
### Errors when using extract_item function with incorrect item type
-  Ensure the item type is correct and not a string before calling extract_item function
### Errors when chest is full and mining drill is trying to drop items into it
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before starting the smelting process
### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
-  Ensure the boiler has the required fuel before starting the process
### Errors when generator has no input liquid
-  Ensure the generator has the required input liquid before starting the process
